title: (Mon Full) 2 Truths And A Lie Championship + Why Lunchbox Wants Bobby’s New Show ‘Snake in the Grass’ To Do Well Tonight + Bobby Is Fighting Through Some Pain
itunes:title: (Mon Full) 2 Truths And A Lie Championship + Why Lunchbox Wants Bobby’s New Show ‘Snake in the Grass’ To Do Well Tonight + Bobby Is Fighting Through Some Pain
description:
It's the big round of 2 Truths and 1 Lie with all 4 listeners from last week! Whoever can last the longest will win $40,000!!!! Bobby’s new TV Show “Snake in the Grass” premieres tonight on USA. Lunchbox is surprisingly supportive after Bobby reveals a new wrinkle. Bobby reveals he’s been having some issues with his jaw. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
